lead_paragraph: Robert Iger, chief of the mass media company, has a history of reinvigorating the company by making deals, but despite a string of good decisions, shares are dipping and investors are getting antsy.

headline.print_headline: With Disney’s Hot Streak Stalled, Speculation That It’s Looking to Grow
headline.main: Disney’s Hot Streak Stalls, Prompting Rumors That It’s Looking to Grow

snippet: Robert Iger, chief of the mass media company, has a history of reinvigorating the company by making deals, but despite a string of good decisions, shares are dipping and investors are getting antsy....
abstract: Analysts speculate on Walt Disney Company's possible purchase of Twitter following report entertainment company is evaluating finances of social networking platform in order to make bid; some say acquisition will brighten future of Disney's cable network ESPN, thereby calming investor concerns and boosting stock price.
